attributes.action: pressure the organisers of Glade Festival into getting Electrypnose to play (a night-time set) there.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I've been dying to listen to some bangin' night-time psy at Glade, and Electrypnose would do the job just fine! x

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
